post_title: FS: Cy Young, bare hand, PSA 4...
post_content:
Great looking card of the HOF pitcher.

$3400, shipping in the conus included, payment via PayPal "friends and family" for long standing/known net54 members, personal/bank check, for everyone else.  Checks have to clear before I send out the card.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any messages/inquiries.  A mountain of references are available from my 15 year history on the forum.

Please send a PM if interested.
